name: Against 150
description:
Hey,

This is my first game ever I am really exited that I could make a game, I made this just to participate in GameDev.tv's Game Jam. as I am totally beginner and still learning, you may see many bugs in my game. But again it because I am totally new :).

That game has a simple rule: "Try to survive until you destroy 150 Enemy ships"

Keys:

W = towards

A = left

S = backward

D = right

Space = shoot

or

Mouse Left Button = shoot
